game.name: Game of Thrones Winter is Coming
game.genres: Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Game of Thrones Winter is Coming은 HBO의 TV 드라마를 원작으로 한 PC 전술 게임으로, HBO 산하의 Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment가 공식 라이선스를 보유하고, YOOZOO Games가 개발 및 퍼블리싱 합니다. 야심 넘치는 웨스테로스의 영주가 되어 전쟁으로 고통받는 백성을 구하고 칠왕국 간의 칠왕국 사이의 끝없는 반목을 끝내세요. Unity 엔진을 사용하고 있으며 저명한 아티스트들이 디자인한 아름다운 캐릭터와 풍광을 자랑합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Game of Thrones Winter is Coming is a PC strategy game based on the HBO drama television series, officially licensed by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment under HBO, and developed and published by YOOZOO Games. Interactive Entertainment and HBO.

reviewHighlights.text: I joined the game expexting to feel like a mighty lord. Instead I felt like a medieval farmer: harvest resources, build things, upgrade, repeat. But a...
My gambling addict friend said if I post a review and it gets 150 likes and 50 Awards that he will buy me a case of beer, some vodka and 1 kg of lemon...
